attributes.action: address the safety of emergency services staff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Manchester's football violence and today's attacks on Naples firefighters show how dangerous working in the emergency services can be. Crisis after crisis, the police, ambulancemen and 
firfighters are there when we need them for us. Let's be there for them. We the undersigned acknowledge what a great they do - and the petitioner calls on the P.M. to make working practices safe. Earlier this month, the EU's executive commission began legal action against Italy over the crisis - can the EU please also address this.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
